T02TD1584E:48b-1: badzra yo gi n'i mandala bhi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD1584E:48b-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD1584E:48b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1584E:48b-5: dri med mnyam pa med pa yum gyi mchog gyur rdo rje mdzes ma las byung chos kyi dris //
T02TD1584E:48b-6: khyab pa'i mkhas pas grangs med rnams kyi sbrang rtsi len mtshungs rgyun du yang dag bsten pa yis //
T02TD1584E:49a-0: bgegs dang nyon mongs tshogs kyi tsha ba @49a * //
T02TD1584E:49a-1: 'joms par byed cing yon tan tshogs kyis gang ba yi //
T02TD1584E:49a-2: mya ngan 'das pa'i bdud rtsi ster byed bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma la ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1584E:49a-3: bye brag shes pa dpag tu med pas byas pa'i thar ster lta bu ma yin yang //
T02TD1584E:49a-4: 'on kyang bya khyung mkha' la spyod phyir bya gzhan mtha' la mi spyod min pa yis //
T02TD1584E:49a-5: rtogs ldan rnams la bzod gsol rdo rje yid 'ongs lo'i bya ba rnams //
T02TD1584E:49a-6: lus ngag yid kyi gus pa dang ldan don du bdag gis yang dag brjed par bya //
T02TD1584E:49a-8: gti mug chen po'i tshogs kyi mun pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi mig bsgribs nas /
T02TD1584E:49a-9: lam ma yin par 'gro ba'i sems can rnams mthong nas mchog gi snying rje can gyi slob dpon gyis gtso mo'i bzlas pa 'bum dang 'khor gyi khri tsho re re bskyal ba sngon gyi bsnyen pa'o //
T02TD1584E:49a-10: de nas dang por mi dge ba bcu las bzlog cing dge ba bcu la gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:49a-11: bsnyen gnas dang dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i bslab pa dang /
T02TD1584E:49a-12: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i lam gyi de dag nye bar bzung ba'o //
T02TD1584E:49a-13: de ltar dad pa la sogs pa mchog gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob ma dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i don du lan gnyis dang lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD1584E:49a-14: de'i tshogs pa mtshang na de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'i yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyis snying gar gnas pa'i yi ge kam las byung ba'i sdig pa sha za dang mtshungs par sna nas 'thon pa dang /
T02TD1584E:49a-15: de nas yi ge h'um snying gar drangs pa las yongs su gyur pa las khro bo'i rgyal po h'um mdzad phyi rol du byung nas /
T02TD1584E:49a-16: aom sum bha ni sum bha hum h'um phat /
T02TD1584E:49a-17: aom grihna gri hna hum h'um phat /
T02TD1584E:49a-18: aom grihn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1584E:49a-19: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a nabid'i r'a dza ya aa mu ka sya sarba p'a pam n'a sa ya hum h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes brjod cing khro bo'i rgyal po'i rdo rjes sdig pa la bsnun pas stong par bsam ma //
T02TD1584E:49a-20: de nas aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba sya sarba bibhn'am bandha hum h'um phat ces pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bka' byin pa de rang nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya zhing //
T02TD1584E:49b-0: banda ro has lte pa man chad phur pa'i rnam pa can gyi phur pas slob ma'i snying ga'i @49b bgegs la gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:49b-1: phur pa'i 'od zer shin tu rno bas sdang pa thams cad rnam par bsregs te /
T02TD1584E:49b-2: slob ma de yi ge sam las kun du bzang mor bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:49b-3: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis go cha bskon te srung ba dang sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:49b-4: de nyid khanda ro ha'i sngags sam bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags zlos su gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:49b-5: de ltar byas na de'i bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad brlag par 'gyur zhing /
T02TD1584E:49b-6: dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshogs med par 'dzom par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1584E:49b-7: de ni slob ma gzung ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1584E:49b-8: de nas dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1584E:49b-9: bya ba la mkhas pa'i g-yog dang rig ma dang bcas pa'i slob dpon /
T02TD1584E:49b-10: dge ba'i gza' la sogs pa la gtso mo'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas /
T02TD1584E:49b-11: phyogs rnams dang gnas kyi bye brag 'ba' zhig tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa spang ba go bar byas la grong khyer la sogs pa dbang ldan gyi mtshams su'am /
T02TD1584E:49b-12: gang yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su byang dang shar gzhol ba'i rab tu bstar ba'i mandala gyi sa gzhi nges par brtags la /
T02TD1584E:49b-13: der lci ba la sogs pa'i mandala byas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:49b-14: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mchod nas nam mkha' la gshegs par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:49b-15: de nas de na gnas pa'i zhing skyong la sogs pa rnams gtor ma dang nye bar spyod pa la sogs pas mchod do //
T02TD1584E:49b-16: de nas gsol ba btab pa ni //
T02TD1584E:49b-17: gang dag 'dir gnas lha dang klu //
T02TD1584E:49b-18: gnod sbyin srin po gzhan dag dang //
T02TD1584E:49b-19: de dag rnams las gzhi nyid //
T02TD1584E:49b-20: dkyil 'khor don du bdag la sbyin //
T02TD1584E:49b-22: rmi lam la sogs par de nyid kyis gnang ba'am dgag pa ma byas na /
T02TD1584E:49b-23: nang par gyi thun dang po la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa nam mkhar bltas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:49b-24: nyi ma phyed kyi dus su srung ba'i 'khor lo dang bgegs la phur pa gdab pa bsgom pa'am /
T02TD1584E:49b-25: drag po'i sbyin sreg gis bgegs rnams bcom las gzhi de nyid /
T02TD1584E:49b-26: aom a'a: bi ghn'am ta kri ta h'um zhes pa bzlas zhing yungs kar dang thal ba dang chu yis ni ra ma tha bya'o //
T02TD1584E:50a-0: de nyid du sa'i lha mo rdo rje'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la sogs @50a * //
T02TD1584E:50a-1: pa dang ldan par bsgoms la /
T02TD1584E:50a-2: zhal bsil la sogs pas mchod nas ae hye hi la sogs pa'am /
T02TD1584E:50a-3: lha mo khyod nyid la sogs pas lan gsum du gsol ba btab ste /
T02TD1584E:50a-4: de ltar mdzod cig ces gnang ba byin pa dang de yid kyis nam mkha' la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:50a-5: de nas sa gzhi de gegs med par shes par byas la /
T02TD1584E:50a-6: ba hu na ga'i lto bar bkod nas sbyangs pa dang /
T02TD1584E:50a-7: sngags kyis sa gzhi dag par bya ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyis dag par bya ba rnams ni sa sbyang bar rnam pa gsum gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:50a-8: de nas slob dpon phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan la /
T02TD1584E:50a-9: me tog gis spras pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i dbus su bsdad da /
T02TD1584E:50a-10: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa bri bya'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pas bgegs rnams 'joms par byed pas spos snod bzung ste h'um las rdo rje'i lce dang ldan par brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:50a-11: phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa yis /
T02TD1584E:50a-12: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1584E:50a-13: 'dir ni rdo rje che ge bdag / dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya //
T02TD1584E:50a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad byon par zhu //
T02TD1584E:50a-15: 'dir ni dngos grub gnang bar mdzod //
T02TD1584E:50a-16: ces pas snyan gsan phab nas mchod de /
T02TD1584E:50a-17: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i slob ma phyogs bzhir gnas te rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas sam /
T02TD1584E:50a-18: gcig phyogs bzhi ru rim pas phyin nas brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:50a-19: sems dpa' kun la sems chen po //
T02TD1584E:50a-20: rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med //
T02TD1584E:50a-21: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1584E:50a-22: de bzhin gshegs kun rang bzhin bral //
T02TD1584E:50a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1584E:50a-24: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1584E:50a-25: chos rnams zhi ba las byung mchog / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes spyod //
T02TD1584E:50a-26: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1584E:50a-27: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD1584E:50a-28: mtshan nyid bral ba rnam par spangs //
T02TD1584E:50a-29: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1584E:50b-0: zhes pa so so nas gsol ba 'debs su @50b gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:50b-1: de ltar gsol ba 'dabs pa med na bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
T02TD1584E:50b-2: de nas sngon du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spros la /
T02TD1584E:50b-3: bsgroms pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje khu chur gnyis kyi mdzub mo rtse sdang de spyi gtsug du kha phyogs pa bzung la /
T02TD1584E:50b-4: h'um h'um badzra au ta tishtha zhes brjod de bteg nas nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol nas skyil krung bshig ste langs la /
T02TD1584E:50b-5: shar du kha phyogs pa dang rkang pa gshibs nas thal mo spyi bor sbyar ba dang /
T02TD1584E:50b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag byas te /
T02TD1584E:50b-7: sems can rnams ma rigs pa'i mun pas bsgribs pas bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bltas la /
T02TD1584E:50b-8: bdud rnams gzhom pa'i phyir skad cig gis rdo rje phag mor bskyed pa la mig gnyis byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje'i lta ba des phyogs kun du blta zhing nga rgyal byas la /
T02TD1584E:50b-9: bdag ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1584E:50b-10: rdo rje sems ma nyid kyang bdag / bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal mo che //
T02TD1584E:50b-11: bdag ni rnal 'byor rgyal mo ste //
T02TD1584E:50b-12: bdag ni phyag na rdo rjer brtan //
T02TD1584E:50b-14: de nas rkang pa'i mthil du h'um las byung ba'i 'bar bzhin pa'i rdo rje bsams te /
T02TD1584E:50b-15: skabs kyi dbye bas rol pa dang bcas pa'i padma'i lag kor bya zhing /
T02TD1584E:50b-16: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol /
T02TD1584E:50b-17: rdo rje 'gros kyis dbang ldan na phar la g-yon skor gyis slob ma dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la gar bya zhing brjod pas /
T02TD1584E:50b-27: rgan po dang rgan mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:50b-31: gsang sngags grub pa rnams sa phyogs 'di ma yin pa'i gnas gzhan du rgyu gcig / slob dpon che ge mo bdag slob ma che ge mo mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i don dang /
T02TD1584E:50b-32: sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:51a-0: de'i phyir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bka' stsal gnang nas myur bar 'gro bar gyis shig / gal te gang zhig mi 'gro bar gyur na de'i spyi bor rdo rje 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba 'dis 'bar @51a * //
T02TD1584E:51a-1: ba rab tu 'bar nas rdo rje ye shes chen pos mgo tshal pa brgyar byed do zhes pa lan gsum brjod pa dang /
T02TD1584E:51a-2: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa khro bo'i lha mo rnams spros te /
T02TD1584E:51a-3: sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i cho ga'i rim pas bgegs rnams gzhom par byas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i sa 'og yan chad rdo rje lta bur byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD1584E:51a-4: de nas rkang pa'i mthil byin gyis brlabs la bcag par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:51a-5: de nas mandala dri yis nye bar byugs te /
T02TD1584E:51a-6: me tog la sogs pas mchod ba dang /
T02TD1584E:51a-7: sgo bzhi nas spos snod bzung la glu dang gar la sogs pas kyang mchod do ;
T02TD1584E:51a-8: / de nas sa la reg la bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
T02TD1584E:51a-9: yi ge brgya pa lan brgyad bzlas nas /
T02TD1584E:51a-10: de nyid du lha mo rnams kyi 'khor lo spro ba dang bsdu ba byas la nyal lo //
T02TD1584E:51a-11: des ni sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:51a-13: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i dbus su dri'i mandala byas nas /
T02TD1584E:51a-14: bam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i lha mor bsam pa dang /
T02TD1584E:51a-15: ye shes kyi lha mo spyan drangs te /
T02TD1584E:51a-16: dam tshig gi lha mo dang ro gcig tu gyur pa sems spro ba dang bcas pa /
T02TD1584E:51a-17: kha dog ser mo na bza' dkar po dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis spras pa /
T02TD1584E:51a-18: phyag g-yon gyis gser gyi bum pa bzang po bsnams pa /
T02TD1584E:51a-19: g-yas mi 'jigs pa mdzad pa mdun du bzhugs te /
T02TD1584E:51a-20: sgrub pa po la gzigs pa las yon chab sngon du song ba'i sgo nas yang dag par mchod nas mnyes pa dang bcas par bsam pa ni /
T02TD1584E:51a-21: aom aa hi ye hi ma h'a pri thi wi lo ka m'a ta re sarba ratna pu rane /
T02TD1584E:51a-22: de bya aa lam ka ra bhu shi te ha ra nu pu ra nir gho she /
T02TD1584E:51a-23: badzras tva pra bhu dze te /
T02TD1584E:51a-24: gri h'i ta ai dam aargham mandala karma su s'a dha ya /
T02TD1584E:51a-25: h'i h'i h'i ham sv'a h'a /
T02TD1584E:51a-26: zhes pa lan gsum brjod de spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD1584E:51a-28: sa gzhi la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:51a-30: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD1584E:51a-31: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD1584E:51a-32: ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa yi //
T02TD1584E:51a-33: lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur ltar //
T02TD1584E:51a-34: de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD1584E:51a-35: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1584E:51a-36: zhes pa lan gsum brjod de /
T02TD1584E:51a-37: lhag par gnas pa byas pas de ltar bgyi zhes gsungs nas de nyid du thim par bsam mo //
T02TD1584E:51b-0: @51b de nas lag pa rdo rje bcings pas la mnan la /
T02TD1584E:51b-1: aom badzri bha ba h'um zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas /
T02TD1584E:51b-2: rdo rje bcings pa las h'um 'bar bzhin pa'i tshogs spros pa dang /
T02TD1584E:51b-3: sa 'og gi bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsams te /
T02TD1584E:51b-4: aom badzra dri dha tishtha zhes pa lan gsum brjod de /
T02TD1584E:51b-5: sa'i lha mo de nyid rang gi dbang du bya'o //
T02TD1584E:51b-7: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri zhim pos yi ge gsum brjod cing byug par byas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:51b-8: me tog gis chal par bkram la khrus byas te lus dri dang ldan par bya /
T02TD1584E:51b-10: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog gi phreng bas sku la brgyan la /
T02TD1584E:51b-11: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi'i dbus su gnas te /
T02TD1584E:51b-12: kha shar du phyogs pa'i slob dpon bcom ldan 'das ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas lha mo rnams kyi gnas rnams la bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i dri zhim pos mandala byas te /
T02TD1584E:51b-13: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par bsgoms la /
T02TD1584E:51b-14: de rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD1584E:51b-15: sgrub thabs su bshad pa'i chogs phyi'i mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba rnams byas la /
T02TD1584E:51b-16: de nas byang du kha phyogs te /
T02TD1584E:51b-17: bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor phyi rol gyi dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa rnams rtsa ba nag po ma yin pa /
T02TD1584E:51b-20: lto ba che ba tsandan la sogs pa dkar bas byugs pa /
T02TD1584E:51b-21: lha mo rnams kyi mtshan ma btags pa bdud rtsi lnga dang dri zhim pa'i chu dang /
T02TD1584E:51b-23: 'bru sna lnga dang sman lnga rnams kyis gang ba /
T02TD1584E:51b-24: mdzes pa'i shing lo lngas brgyan pa /
T02TD1584E:51b-25: dri ma dang bral ba'i ras zung gis mgrin pa dkris pa /
T02TD1584E:51b-26: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan mas rim pa bzhin du mtshan ma dang ldan pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas de dang de rnams dri zhim po'i mandala byas pa'i steng du ji ltar rigs pa'i gdan rnams kyi steng du gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:51b-27: de la h'um yig lan bdun brjod cing bcing ba'i skud pa dkar po bdun gyis dkri bar bya ba ni /
T02TD1584E:52a-0: aom badzra she kha re ru ta ma ta di sh'am bandha bandha h'um zhes @52a * //
T02TD1584E:52a-2: de nas stong pa'i ngang las bam yig yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i rin po che'i gzugs su gser la sogs pa las byung ba'i bum pa rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-3: de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbye bas bum pa'i dbye ba bshes par byas la /
T02TD1584E:52a-4: las thams cad la khanda ro ha dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-5: gal te lha grangs dang mnyam pa ltar na yang las thams cad pa yis lhag pa'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-6: de yang bya ba mang po'am gtso bor byed pa'i don du rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i ster du dung ngam thod pa bdud rtsi dang dri chu dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:52a-7: me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i rdo rje h'um zhes brjod cing gzhag go / de nas aom badzra au da ka tha: h'um zhes pa dang /
T02TD1584E:52a-8: yi ge gsum lan bdun du bzlas te ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD1584E:52a-9: bum pa'i nang rnams su aom tapte ma h'a tapte sv'a h'a zhes pas spyan drangs pa'i chu'i rang bzhin las gdan dang bcas pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo rnams skad cig gis rnam par bsgoms la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la ro gcig tu gyur pa yan chad bya /
T02TD1584E:52a-10: mtshan ma la yang dam tshig gi lha mo rnams ye shes kyi lha mo rnams dang ro gcig tu gyur bar bsam mo //
T02TD1584E:52a-11: de nas h'um zhes brjod cing rdo rje me tog dang bcas pa g-yas pas bzung la 'khor lo'i gtso mo'i snying po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ba'am /
T02TD1584E:52a-12: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes pa bzlas pa'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-13: de ltar khanda ro ha mngon par bzlas la me tog gsum der gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-14: bum pa gzhan de dang der lha de nyid kyis brgya rtsa brgyad dam bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-15: de rnams yang dag par mchod nas las thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chu'i shing los bsrung ba'i don du bsang gtor byas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:52a-16: ji srid dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba ma rdzogs kyi bar du bgegs rnams bsrung ba gyis shig ces brjod nas gtor ma byin la reg la /
T02TD1584E:52a-17: mi bskyod rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te dril bu dkrol lo //
T02TD1584E:52a-18: bum pa de rnams nas chu cung zad re blangs la dkyil 'khor gyi lho sgo'i shar dang nye ba ru ma nyidzi'i steng du dung la sogs pa bzhag pa nas /
T02TD1584E:52a-19: bdag nyid kyis slob ma la bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD1584E:52a-20: bum pa rnams la mchod pa nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bya'o //
T02TD1584E:52b-0: 'di ni bum pa lhag par @52b gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1584E:52b-1: de nas gsang ba'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa des dri dang me tog gis lha gnas bkod la /
T02TD1584E:52b-2: dkyil 'khor de la rnal 'byor bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor mas gtso bo byas pa'i lha mo'i 'khor la gnas pa rnams la zhabs bsil la sogs pa byin te /
T02TD1584E:52b-3: bar ma dang mchog dang dbus dang dri dang bcas pa'i chu dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas bstod de bdud rtsi myang ba dang /
T02TD1584E:52b-4: bus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te lce h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa h'um gis mtshan par bskyed la /
T02TD1584E:52b-5: lag pas spos snod bzung ste dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:52b-6: bcom ldan rdo rje phag mo nyid //
T02TD1584E:52b-7: rig pa'i rgyal mo la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1584E:52b-9: mgon po bri bar 'tshal pa yin //
T02TD1584E:52b-10: slob ma rjes su gzung phyir dang //
T02TD1584E:52b-11: khyod la mchod par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1584E:52b-12: bdag ni bcom ldan ma la gus //
T02TD1584E:52b-13: bka' drin gyis ni gnang bar rigs //
T02TD1584E:52b-14: lha mo rnams kyi thugs rje yis //
T02TD1584E:52b-16: 'bras bu la gnas byang chub sems //
T02TD1584E:52b-17: gzhan yang sngags kyi lha rnams dang //
T02TD1584E:52b-18: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD1584E:52b-19: 'byung po byang chub la phyogs dang //
T02TD1584E:52b-20: bstan pa skyong ba'i sems can te //
T02TD1584E:52b-21: gang zhig rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams //
T02TD1584E:52b-22: bdag ni rdo rje che ge che //
T02TD1584E:52b-23: gus dang bcas pas zhabs tog tu //
T02TD1584E:52b-24: rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1584E:52b-25: 'gro ba dag phyir bri bar bya //
T02TD1584E:52b-26: slob ma dang bcas bdag nyid la //
T02TD1584E:52b-27: rjes su brtse ba dang ldan pas //
T02TD1584E:52b-28: dkyil 'khor ma lus pa rnams dang //
T02TD1584E:52b-29: nyid ni nya bar gnas par rigs //
T02TD1584E:52b-30: zhes pa'i don shes par byas la gsol ba gdab par bya ba dang /
T02TD1584E:52b-31: de nas de nyid du dam tshig can 'du bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:52b-32: de ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1584E:52b-33: de de ltar dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas te shin tu legs par brtags pa'o //
T02TD1584E:52b-34: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba /
T02TD1584E:52b-35: dge bsnyen la sogs pa'i bslab pa dang ldan pa /
T02TD1584E:52b-36: thos pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu song ba /
T02TD1584E:52b-37: bcom ldan 'das bde mchog dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma mnyes par byed pas mandala sngon du song ba dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-1: btsugs te me tog snyim par thogs pa'i slob ma rnams la /
T02TD1584E:53a-3: 'jig rten pha rol bde don te //
T02TD1584E:53a-4: 'on kyang sangs rgyas thob don to //
T02TD1584E:53a-5: blo dang ldan pas 'jug par bya //
T02TD1584E:53a-7: skad cig gis shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid du bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1584E:53a-8: de nyid kha nas bcug ste lha mo'i padma la gnas pa la bdag nyid kyis dbang bskur bas rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs su bsgom zhing /
T02TD1584E:53a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams gsol ba 'debs su gzhug pa ni /
T02TD1584E:53a-10: skye dang rgas dang 'chi ba dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-11: chu srin la sogs 'jigs pa yi //
T02TD1584E:53a-13: nga la ston pa mgon po che //
T02TD1584E:53a-14: bde ba chen po bdag 'tshal bas //
T02TD1584E:53a-15: byang chub chen po'i lam bstan pa //
T02TD1584E:53a-16: dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD1584E:53a-17: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1584E:53a-18: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-19: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1584E:53a-20: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du //
T02TD1584E:53a-21: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD1584E:53a-22: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1584E:53a-23: phag mo he ru ka nyid dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-24: gsang ba'i gnas sogs rnam par dag / lus la gnas pa gsung bar zhu //
T02TD1584E:53a-26: slob ma gcig gtso bor byas pa mdun du bzhag nas /
T02TD1584E:53a-27: bu tshur theg pa chen po la //
T02TD1584E:53a-28: sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1584E:53a-29: khyod ni lam chen snod yin pas //
T02TD1584E:53a-30: khyod la yang dag gsol ba 'debs //
T02TD1584E:53a-31: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-32: de ltar yang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-33: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gang //
T02TD1584E:53a-34: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dang //
T02TD1584E:53a-35: de dag kun gyi gsang ba yi //
T02TD1584E:53a-36: cho ga bzang po 'di rnams kyis //
T02TD1584E:53a-37: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
T02TD1584E:53a-38: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa thob //
T02TD1584E:53a-39: sh'akya seng ge la sogs kyis //
T02TD1584E:53a-40: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD1584E:53a-41: stobs chen rnams kyang gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD1584E:53a-42: sbyor ba mnyam pa med pas bcom //
T02TD1584E:53a-43: de bzhin thams cad mkhyen thob phyir //
T02TD1584E:53a-44: bu la gang dang gang 'dod pa'i //
T02TD1584E:53a-45: cho ga ma lus sbyin par bya //
T02TD1584E:53a-46: byang chub dngos grub thob par gyis //
T02TD1584E:53b-0: @53b sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1584E:53b-1: nges par gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1584E:53b-2: 'khor lo gsum gyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1584E:53b-3: bye brag mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang //
T02TD1584E:53b-4: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1584E:53b-5: rgyal ba'i sras rnams ma lus dang //
T02TD1584E:53b-6: thams cad gus pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1584E:53b-7: bla ma rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1584E:53b-8: zhes pa lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD1584E:53b-9: de nas thun mong gi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02TD1584E:53b-10: bye brag gi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1584E:53b-11: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02TD1584E:53b-12: ji srid snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du /
T02TD1584E:53b-13: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD1584E:53b-14: mchog tu bskyed par bya ba ni //
T02TD1584E:53b-15: ji ltar ji srid mgon rnams kyis //
T02TD1584E:53b-16: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad ltar //
T02TD1584E:53b-17: tshul khrims sdom pa'i rnam pa dang //
T02TD1584E:53b-18: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD1584E:53b-19: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD1584E:53b-20: bdag gis brtan po gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-21: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1584E:53b-22: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD1584E:53b-23: dus 'di nas ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-24: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni //
T02TD1584E:53b-25: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1584E:53b-26: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD1584E:53b-27: so so'i rang bzhin gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-28: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-29: nyi re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02TD1584E:53b-30: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1584E:53b-31: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba yi //
T02TD1584E:53b-32: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02TD1584E:53b-33: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD1584E:53b-34: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD1584E:53b-35: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
T02TD1584E:53b-36: dam pa'i chos rnams so sor gzung //
T02TD1584E:53b-37: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD1584E:53b-38: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
T02TD1584E:53b-39: so sor yongs su gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-40: mchod pa'i las kyang gus par bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-41: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02TD1584E:53b-42: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-43: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
T02TD1584E:53b-44: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1584E:53b-45: ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-46: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:53b-47: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bgyi //
T02TD1584E:54a-2: ces pa lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD1584E:54a-3: de nas go cha drug gi sngags kyis bsrungs la gnas gsum byin gyis brlab ste /
T02TD1584E:54a-4: yang de rnams su dri'i chu dang rdo rjes reg nas me tog la sogs pas mgo bo la sogs pa mchod do //
T02TD1584E:54a-5: de nas byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa las byung ba'i shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mo'i cha la me tog dang bcas pa slob ma la sbyin no //
T02TD1584E:54a-6: de nas mandala grub zhib phyogs re la khru re dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1584E:54a-7: ba lang lci ba la sogs pa byugs pa der bya dang ma shar du kha blta bar so shing dor ba ni /
T02TD1584E:54a-8: aom badzra ha sa ham zhes brjod de rtse mo bstan nas steng du ltos pa med par dor la //
T02TD1584E:54a-9: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub des brtag pa'i shar la sogs pas zhi ba la sogs pa drug dang /
T02TD1584E:54a-10: mandala gyi phyir rol du song na dngos grub med do zhes brjod do //
T02TD1584E:54a-11: de nas bam las byung ba'i dri chu la lan bdun bzlas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:54a-12: aom hr'i: bi shuddha dharma sarba p'a pa ni ts'asya sho dha ya sarba bi ka wan aa pa na ya h'um zhes pa lan gsum du brjod cing khyor bar byin te 'thung du gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:54a-13: de nas h'um las byung ba'i ku sha la de nyid lan bdud bzlas te /
T02TD1584E:54a-15: yang dh'i: las byung ba la de nyid lan bdun bzlas te sngas kyi don du'o //
T02TD1584E:54a-16: aom badzra t'ikshna zhes pa'i sngags kyis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:54a-17: de nas skud pa mdud pa gsum byas pa dpung pa g-yon pa la btags pa ni /
T02TD1584E:54a-18: aom buddha mee tri raksha raksha sarb'a na sv'a h'a /
T02TD1584E:54a-19: zhes pa brjod cing bcings pas so //
T02TD1584E:54a-20: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te me tog gis thod bya'o //
T02TD1584E:54a-21: de nas gzangs bstod pa ni //
T02TD1584E:54a-22: bskal pa bye ba grangs med par //
T02TD1584E:54a-23: sngon du sdig pa gang bgyis pa //
T02TD1584E:54a-25: de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:54a-26: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02TD1584E:54a-27: blo gros shing tu dri med par//
T02TD1584E:54a-28: sdug bsngal rnams la gnas pa yis //
T02TD1584E:54a-30: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1584E:54a-31: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD1584E:54a-32: de phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas //
T02TD1584E:54a-33: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1584E:54a-34: thams cad yongs su gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1584E:54b-0: bdag @54b nyid chen por bskyed pa des //
T02TD1584E:54b-1: khyed rnams theg pa chen po la //
T02TD1584E:54b-2: legs par bgrod par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1584E:54b-3: de phyir 'di ni lam gyi mchog / theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i gzhi //
T02TD1584E:54b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:54b-7: de nas cho ga'i sngags kyis bsrung ste /
T02TD1584E:54b-8: sngags de nyid bzlas pa'i don du byin la /
T02TD1584E:54b-9: nang par snga par rmi lam zlos shig ces brjod la 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su seng ge ltar nyal du gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:54b-10: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi khang bar zhugs la bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:54b-11: 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:54b-13: // / de nas phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab la bcom ldan 'das ma'i rnal 'byor ma dang ldan pas lhag par gnas par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams ye shes kyi thig gi don du lha rnams nam mkha' la bteg la shar phyogs su kha phyogs pas mtshan ma rnyed pa dang /
T02TD1584E:54b-14: me tog gis brlan pa'i shi ba'i skud pa'am /
T02TD1584E:54b-15: dpa' bo la nyos pa gzhon nu mas bkal ba ji lta ba bzhin btsos pa thod pa lnga'i nang du bzhag la /
T02TD1584E:54b-16: yungs kar gyi phye ma dang bdud rtsi lnga yis spags pa dang /
T02TD1584E:54b-17: lag pa g-yon pha'i mthil nas sor mo'i rtse mo'i bar du bkram la /
T02TD1584E:54b-18: mdun gyi nam mkha' la skad cig gis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa mos pa byas nas /
T02TD1584E:54b-19: de rnams kyi snying gnas ye shes kyi skud pa 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gnas pa la //
T02TD1584E:54b-20: aom a'a: badzra d'a ki n'i badzra s'u tre me pra yatsatsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra na ya h'um zhes pas mkha' 'gro ma la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02TD1584E:54b-21: de ltar ming brjes pas bla ma la sogs pa la yang gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD1584E:54b-22: de nas mig gnyis la dzra: yig las byung ba'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po'i bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD1584E:54b-23: aom drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes pa brjod pa de rab tu g-yo ba'i mig gi rdzi ma la 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa spros pas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bskul nas spyan drangs te /
T02TD1584E:54b-24: lag pa la gnas pa'i rang rang gi kha dog dang ldan pa'i skud pa la bstim mo //
T02TD1584E:54b-25: de nas slob ma khanda ro ha'i cha byad byas pa dang bcas pas /
T02TD1584E:55a-0: dang po skud pa lnga lnga logs su bsgrims te de nas de ltar lnga po rnams @55a * //
T02TD1584E:55a-2: de ltar lnga gcig tu byas pa'i skud pa la aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spha ra spha r'a nu pra wishata: sarba dharm'a: aa tyan t'a nu pa wishta: sarba dharm'a: aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur gyis ring ba la //
T02TD1584E:55a-3: slob dpon gyis mthe bo'i nas tshad du bsgrim par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55a-4: de nyid padma'i snod du bzhag la me tog dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas sngags te me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02TD1584E:55a-5: phreng ba dang snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1584E:55a-6: aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes pas lhag par gnas par byas nas /
T02TD1584E:55a-7: aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat ces sngags kyis bum pa'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi la mngon par gtor ba dang /
T02TD1584E:55a-8: dri yis kyang nye bar byug par bya sla //
T02TD1584E:55a-9: dri bya'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la mngon par dmigs te /
T02TD1584E:55a-10: yon chab sngon du song pa'i sgo nas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD1584E:55a-11: rang dang slob ma'i mig gnyis su dza: las byung ba'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa bsgoms te /
T02TD1584E:55a-12: rdo rje phyed pa'i 'dug stangs kyis skud pa lag pa g-yon pas lte bar bzung ba dang /
T02TD1584E:55a-13: dzadza: dzadza: dzadza: zhes brjod cing bsgyur ro //
T02TD1584E:55a-14: byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa pas kyang de ltar bzung la de ltar brjod cing skud pa blangs te nub phyogs su bsdad nas shar phyogs dang /
T02TD1584E:55a-15: lho phyogs su bsdad nas byang phyogs su lte bar mtshungs par nam mkha'i thig gdab pa ni byang dang shar du bsdad pa lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa mthe bor dang gung mos se gol gtogs bzhin pas so //
T02TD1584E:55a-16: de yang thig 'debs pa'i dus thams cad du aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um h'um aom sva: a'a zhes brjod cing btab pas de'i sgra yis dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams gang nas skud pa la thim par bsam mo //
T02TD1584E:55a-17: thig 'debs pa'i dus thams cad du slob dpon dang byang phyogs kyi sgrub pa pos g-yon skor gyis phyogs kun du 'gro bar bya zhing phyogs thams cad mnyam pa'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55a-18: nam mkha'i zig dang mtshungs par phab ste tshangs thig gnyis po yang dag par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55a-19: rlung du bsdad nas shar du kha phyogs pas byang phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig go //
T02TD1584E:55b-0: de nyid du bsdad nas @55b nub phyogs dang me mtshams su bsdad nas byang phyogs su kha phyogs pas shar phyogs dang /
T02TD1584E:55b-1: de nyid du bsdad nas nub tu kha phyogs pas lho phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig go / bden bral du bsdad nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi thig go //
T02TD1584E:55b-2: me mtshams su bsdad nas rlung mtshams kyi thig go //
T02TD1584E:55b-3: de nyid las bzlog pa rnams su slob ma bsdad pas thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55b-4: de yang ji ltar gdab na /
T02TD1584E:55b-5: phra na nad byed chad na brlag / bkra mi shis na dngos grub med //
T02TD1584E:55b-6: g-yas su bskor na slob ma brlag / de nas mnyam gzhag thig gdab bya //
T02TD1584E:55b-7: zhes pa'i don dang ldan pas so //
T02TD1584E:55b-8: tshangs pa'i don thig gi phyi rol gyi g-yas dang g-yon du cha gnyis dang gcig dang gnyis gcig dang gcig spangs pa nges par sgo khyud kyi nang dang phyi rol dang logs kyi nang phyi dang ka ba'i bar dang ka ba rnams kyi thig go / de nas dbus su skud pa btags la rtsa ba'i thig nas tshangs pa'i thig gi bar du nang nas nang du re re zhing sgo'i tshad kyi bzhi bskor ro //
T02TD1584E:55b-10: rtsa ba'i thig nas brtsams nas ni //
T02TD1584E:55b-11: zlum po bzhi yi thig nyid kyis //
T02TD1584E:55b-12: bskor te 'khor lo gsum bya ba //
T02TD1584E:55b-13: sgo yi tshad kyis shes par bya //
T02TD1584E:55b-15: tshad las cung zad lhag chad min //
T02TD1584E:55b-16: rdo rje padma la sogs phreng //
T02TD1584E:55b-17: thugs 'khor la sogs mu khyud do //
T02TD1584E:55b-19: de'i phyir dang po nas gsum gyi nang dang nang rnams su cha phyed pa rnams spangs te thig zlum pos bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55b-20: de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i don du cha gcig bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55b-21: de nas lte ba'i don du cha phyed dang bcas pa'i gcig bskor bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:55b-22: rtsibs so so'i zhing rnams la cha drug drug go //
T02TD1584E:55b-23: de rnams kyi bar rnams la yang rdo rje la sogs pas bskor bar gang dag 'dod do //
T02TD1584E:55b-24: rtsa ba'i thig gi rgyab nas cha gcig dang gnyis dang gcig pa gcig dang drug rnams kyis bskor ba la rtsig pa'i phyi'i thig dang 'dod yon dang rin chen pha gu dang dra ba dra phyed dang ba ku l'i dang kra ma sh'irsha dang /
T02TD1584E:55b-25: rta babs dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang rdo rje'i rtse mo dang padma dang rdo rje'i rab dang me ri dang dur khrod rnams kyi thig gdab bo //
T02TD1584E:55b-26: rta babs kyi ka ba'i steng gi chu srin gyi kha nas dar dbyangs la sogs pa ji ltar mdzes par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-2: / de nyid snam bu bcu gcig pa //
T02TD1584E:56a-3: zhes gsungs pas de yang gser dang ba ku l'i dang rin chen snam bu dang rta rmig dang mun pa'i snam bu dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-4: zlum po dang mun pa'i snam bu dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-5: pa ku l'i dang rin chen snam bu dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-6: rta rmig har mi'i snam bu rnams las mun pa'i snam bu gnyis las cha phyed dang bcas pa'i re re'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-7: gzhan snam bu dgu la cha re re'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-8: de yang tshangs pa'i thig las g-yas dang g-yon du phyed dang bcas pa'i cha lnga lnga spangs te phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gnyis gnyis ni snam bu dang po'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-9: de ltar steng dang steng rnams su rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du cha drug drug spangs te /
T02TD1584E:56a-10: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gsum gsum dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-11: cha bzhi bzhi spangs te cha lnga lnga dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-12: phyed dang bcas pa'i cha gsum spangs te phyed dang bcas pa'i cha bzhi bzhi dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-13: cha gsum gsum spangs te cha lnga dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-14: bdun pa nas snam bu bzhi la bdun bdun dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56a-15: bcu gcig pa cha lnga lnga dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1584E:56a-16: snam bu thams cad kyi phyi dang nang rnams phyir byung ba dang nang du song ba'i dbye bas thig re re'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-17: rta babs kyi steng du chos kyi 'khor lo cha gnyis so //
T02TD1584E:56a-18: de'i 'gram dag tu cha gnyis la ri dags dag 'khor lo la blta bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-19: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la sgo bcu gnyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1584E:56a-20: rdo rje'i ra'i rtse la cha bcu drug pa'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-21: ra'i rtse rnams kra ma sh'i rsha'i steng nas sboms la cha gsum pa bgags kyis phra ba ste /
T02TD1584E:56a-22: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi cha gnyis kyi sa la dbus kyi ral phyogs pa'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-23: gang dag padma'i ge sar la cha gnyis 'dod pa yod de /
T02TD1584E:56a-24: rdo rje'i ra dang ge sar gyis gzhi ste zur rnams la gdugs dang dang dpyangs dang bcas pa cha bzhi la'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-25: de nas g-yon dang g-yas kyi mig dag la hr'i: yig dag zla ba dang nyi mar bskyed la phyogs bzhi ru blta zhing bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02TD1584E:56a-26: thar pa'i sgo rnam par 'gegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa 'phyag par bsams la /
T02TD1584E:56a-27: h'i h'i: zhes brjod cing sgo rnams kyi re kh'a dbyi bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:56a-28: re kh'a gzhan yang rang gis brtags la dbyi bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:56b-0: 'di ni thig gdab pa'i @56b cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:56b-2: // / de nas gtor ma byin la zla ba chu shel la sogs pa las byung ba'am /
T02TD1584E:56b-4: 'bras las byung ba la sogs pa'i sa tshon lnga la dur khrod kyi rus pa la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1584E:56b-5: skad cig gis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du dmigs la /
T02TD1584E:56b-6: ye shes pa nam mkha' la dmigs pa'i snying ga na ye shes kyi tshon gnas pa thig skud kyi skabs su gsungs pa ltar blta bas bkug ste bcug pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56b-7: ro gcig tu gyur pa'i ye shes kyi tshon /
T02TD1584E:56b-8: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i zhes pa la sogs pa mngon par bzlas te /
T02TD1584E:56b-9: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so //
T02TD1584E:56b-10: de ltar 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis sbar bar bya zhing hr'i: yig gis so so la byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang /
T02TD1584E:56b-11: bden pa'i byin gyis sbar bar bya ba dang /
T02TD1584E:56b-12: lha mo rnams shin tu sgrub pa'i stobs kyis sbar ba'o //
T02TD1584E:56b-13: h'um zhes brjod cing dbus kyi phur ba bton la bdag nyid kyi lag pa'i rdo rje la bcug ste phur khung tshon sna lnga yis dgang bar byas pa dang //
T02TD1584E:56b-14: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis mtshan man ngag pa bcom ste chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par bsgoms la dang por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:56b-15: byang shar mtshams nas re kh'a lnga bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:56b-18: phra na rdzas rnams nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:56b-19: yo ba yis ni rtsod par 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:56b-21: g-yas su bskor nas bris pa na ;
T02TD1584E:56b-22: / tshon gyi dngos grub mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD1584E:56b-23: zhes pa'i don go bar byas la legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:56b-24: de yang shar dang byang dang nub dang lha rnams kyi phyogs la nag bo dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser po rnams so //
T02TD1584E:56b-25: dbus kyi sa gzhi dkar po la padma phyogs kyi kha dog gis so //
T02TD1584E:56b-26: rdo rje phreng ba nag po'o //
T02TD1584E:56b-27: thugs kyi 'khor lo yang nag po'o //
T02TD1584E:56b-30: rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo rnams so so dang mtshungs so //
T02TD1584E:56b-31: dbus kyi padma'i lte ba'i nyi ma dang phyogs bzhi'i 'dab ma rnams la gri gug go //
T02TD1584E:57a-1: kyi 'dab ma rnams la bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pa'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-2: thugs la sogs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi rnams sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma rnams la yang gri gug rnams so //
T02TD1584E:57a-3: sgo khyud rnams la zla ba phyed pa rdo rje rin po ches mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-4: rta babs kyi ka ba dang kra ma sh'i rsha gser mdog go //
T02TD1584E:57a-5: rta babs rtseg gi ka ba glang po che'i steng du seng ges mnan pa'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-6: 'dod yon la sogs pa ji ltar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-7: phyi'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams kha dog lnga'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-8: rdo rje'i phreng ba nag po'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-9: me ri'i phreng ba kha dog lnga'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-10: de'i phyi rol tu phyogs mtshams brgyad du sgrub thabs las gsungs pa ltar dur khrod brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i dri zhim pa'i chu dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol rnams la byugs te /
T02TD1584E:57a-12: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes pas ye shes kyi tshon gshegs la rdul tshon gyi snod 'gol ba'i gnas su gzhag go 'di ni tshon gyi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:57a-14: // / de nas sngon du lhag gnas byas pa'i bum pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin g-yon skor gyis dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-15: de nas phyogs mtshams brgyad du ga pur dang tu ru skal sogs pa'i spos snod gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:57a-16: de ltar ba dan rnams kyang ngo //
T02TD1584E:57a-17: de nas kha nub tu phyogs te dkyil 'khor gyi gtse mo'i nga rgyal gyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pa'i ngang las srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams bsgoms te /
T02TD1584E:57a-18: bo la spangs te ka kko la zhes pa'i tshig gis skad cig gis thabs kyi gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD1584E:57a-19: bdag nyid dang mtshungs pa'am phyi'i phyag rgya dang sbyor ba'i sgras ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02TD1584E:57a-20: zhabs bsil dang yon chab dang sngon du song bas 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i phem zhes brjod cing mnyes par byas la /
T02TD1584E:57a-21: bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o//
T02TD1584E:57a-22: chags pa chen por zhu nas rdo rje'i lam nas padmar ye shes kyi lha mo rnams kyi dkyil du spros pa dang /
T02TD1584E:57a-23: de rnams dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD1584E:57a-24: de nas lha mo rnams spros te yid kyis mchod nas //
T02TD1584E:57b-0: me tog dang bdug sbos dang mar me dang dri dang bshos gtsang dang bza' @57b ba dang btung ba dang bldag pa dang bca' ba dang /
T02TD1584E:57b-1: bu mo dang bu dang glang po dang rta la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:57b-2: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin phyi'i bcu drug gam /
T02TD1584E:57b-3: brgyad dam bzhi'i rang rang gi mchod pas mchod nas /
T02TD1584E:57b-4: phreng ba'i sngags kyis bstod de bdud rtsi myangs pas bde ba chen po nyams su myad bar byas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:57b-5: gtso mo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dang 'khor rnams kyi nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so //
T02TD1584E:57b-6: las thams cad pa'i gtor ma btang la yi ge brgya ba bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:57b-7: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:57b-9: // / de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor nas zon te slob ma rnams la rmi lam dris la /
T02TD1584E:57b-10: g-yang du lhung ba la sogs pa rmi ba mthong na go cha'i sngags kyis bsrungs la slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su /
T02TD1584E:57b-11: aom pra bi sha bha ga b'a na ma h'a su kham moksha pu ram sarba siddha su kha pra dam pa ra ma su au ta ta ma siddhya dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya sva zhes pas gzengs bstod la /
T02TD1584E:57b-12: de nas rtse mo'i cha bzung la der 'jug pa ni g-yon skor bya zhing /
T02TD1584E:57b-13: nub sgo la sogs par bsdad la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs la sogs pa'i sgo dbye ba ni //
T02TD1584E:57b-14: aom badzra aud gha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um zhes pa brjod pa dang ;
T02TD1584E:57b-15: / aom pa ra ma h'a su kha a'a sha ya su la li ta bi l'a si /
T02TD1584E:57b-16: na mi te ra na m'a mi bha ga b'antam dza: hr'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi h'i pra h'i tstsha ku sum aanydza li n'a tha ho: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog gi phreng ba phul la slar blangs la bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la btags te /
T02TD1584E:57b-17: rtse mos me tog gi phreng bas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02TD1584E:57b-18: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas me tog gi phreng ba'i dbang la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1584E:57b-19: slob dpon gyi bya ba thams cad kyi rjes su gnang ba thob pa dang bden pa chen po'i bdag nyid thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin la bstod pa sngon du song bas slob ma gzhug pa'i don dang /
T02TD1584E:57b-20: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub 'dod pa'i don du bden pa'i byin brlab bya ba ni /
T02TD1584E:57b-21: sems can kun gyi sems la khyab //
T02TD1584E:57b-22: sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02TD1584E:57b-23: sems can kun gyi mar gyur pa //
T02TD1584E:57b-24: 'dod pa'i gtso mo'i dam tshig mchog /
T02TD1584E:58a-0: @58a * // bden pa'i ye shes mchog gyur pa //
T02TD1584E:58a-1: shes rab thabs dag dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1584E:58a-2: mgon po bdag la bden pa yis //
T02TD1584E:58a-3: 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzod //
T02TD1584E:58a-5: 'di ni slob dpon bdag 'jug gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:58a-7: // / de nas slob ma khrus byas te 'khor lo'i gtso mo'am khanda ro ha'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD1584E:58a-8: aom sarba ta tha ga ta aa nu ta ta ra bo dhi aa lam k'a ra bastra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra sphar na sa ma ye h'um zhes pas na bza' bskon par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58a-10: zhes pas srung skud bcing par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58a-11: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat ces pas thod bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58a-12: aom tsakshu bandha ba ra m'a na ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis mig ras bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58a-13: aom a'a: kham b'i ra h'um zhes brjod cing me tog gi phreng ba gtad do //
T02TD1584E:58a-14: de nas las thams cad pa'i chu yis gtor la gnas gsum du phyag mtshan gsum la gdan gsum gyi steng du kha dog gsum dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis lus la khyab par bsams te /
T02TD1584E:58a-15: shar sgo la gnas pa de las kyi rdo rjes h'um zhes brjod cing khrid pa la /
T02TD1584E:58a-16: kye ho bu sdug khyod su yin zhes pas slob dpon gyis dri bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58a-17: bde chen skal ldan bdag lags so //
T02TD1584E:58a-19: de nas aom sarba yo ga tsi ta tam autp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod de sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58a-20: yang rdo rje snying gar bzung la /
T02TD1584E:58a-21: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes pa brjod do //
T02TD1584E:58a-22: yang lag pa rdo rje dang bcas pas de nyid bzung la /
T02TD1584E:58a-23: ding khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' mo rnams kyis byin gyis brlab kyis /
T02TD1584E:58a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' mo'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang mi ldan pa dang dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig ces brjod la /
T02TD1584E:58a-25: a'a: kham b'i ra h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis yol ba'i nang du gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:58a-26: aom shr'i he ru ka ya wid ma he bidy'a r'a dza ya dhi ma he sv'a h'a zhes pa lan bdun bzlas la /
T02TD1584E:58a-27: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gnas //
T02TD1584E:58a-29: mkha' 'gro ma yi gtso mo ru //
T02TD1584E:58a-30: bdag gis drangs so bu nyid kyi //
T02TD1584E:58a-31: zhes brjod la shar sgo ru /
T02TD1584E:58b-0: na @58b mo na ma h'um sv'a h'a zhes pas sa stengs la sogs pa'i dbye bas phyag gsum bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58b-1: yang de nyid du aom sarba b'i ra yo gi ni bhya: p'u dza au pa sth'a na ya /
T02TD1584E:58b-2: a'a ta ma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+yo d'a ki n+ya aa dhi tishtha tu m'am zhes brjod do //
T02TD1584E:58b-3: byang sgo ru aom sarba p'i ra yo gi n'i nam p'u dza aa bhi she ka a'a ta m'a n'am n'i ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+yo l'a me aa bhi shi nytsa na m'am zhes brjod do //
T02TD1584E:58b-4: nub sgo ru aom sarba b'i ra yo gi ni bhya:/
T02TD1584E:58b-5: p'u dza pra wa rta na ya a'a ta ma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi n+yo khanda ro he dha rma tsakra pra wa rta ya m'am zhes brjod do //
T02TD1584E:58b-6: lho sgor ru aom sarba b'i ra yo gi ni bhya:/
T02TD1584E:58b-7: p'u dza karma ne a'a ta ma n'am ni n'i ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02TD1584E:58b-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta bi ra yo gi n+yo r'u pi n+ye karma ku ru m'am zhes pa rnams brjod cing gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar te phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:58b-9: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs su zhugs pas de'i phyir khyod la ngas rdo rje ye shes bskyed do //
T02TD1584E:58b-10: ye shes des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD1584E:58b-11: gal te khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o //
T02TD1584E:58b-12: dam tshig 'das na sdug bsngal chen po ster bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod la rdo rje spyi bor bzhag ste /
T02TD1584E:58b-13: dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:58b-14: 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02TD1584E:58b-15: gal te smras na mgo bo 'gems //
T02TD1584E:58b-16: zhes pa go bar byas nas snying gar rdo rje bzung ste /
T02TD1584E:58b-17: rdo rje phag mo ding khyod kyi //
T02TD1584E:58b-18: snying la yang dag gnas pa ste //
T02TD1584E:58b-19: gal te gzhan la smras na ni //
T02TD1584E:58b-20: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD1584E:58b-21: zhes pa'i bka' stsal byin la /
T02TD1584E:58b-23: ming med kyis rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i steng gi padma'i snod na gnas pa de'i khar sbyin zhing /
T02TD1584E:58b-24: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1584E:58b-25: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1584E:58b-26: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
T02TD1584E:58b-27: 'thung cig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu//
T02TD1584E:58b-28: aom badzra aa mri ta au dka tha: h'um zhes pa brjod cing mna' chu blud do //
T02TD1584E:58b-29: ding nas brtsams te khyod kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nga yin pas /
T02TD1584E:58b-30: ngas gang bsgo ba de khyod kyis nges par bya dgos so //
T02TD1584E:59a-0: de'i phyir bag yod par gyis la mi mthun pas dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar ma byed @59a * //
T02TD1584E:59a-2: 'di ni dam tshig dang mna' chu blud pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:59a-4: // / de nas dngos grub nges pa'i don du yan lag tshang ba mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma la lha dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59a-5: de yang gnas 'du 'dzi med par bcom ldan 'das ma'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'khor lo gsal bar bsgoms te /
T02TD1584E:59a-6: bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig byas nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma mngon du byas te /
T02TD1584E:59a-7: stod pa'i dang las bam las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das mar bltas la /
T02TD1584E:59a-8: sarba b'i ra yo gi n+ya shtsa aa dhi tashthi tvam /
T02TD1584E:59a-9: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a be sha zhes pa brjod de ji lta ba bzhin du dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59a-10: phabs par gyur pa dang rab tu bcug pa'i lha rnams rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la bcu gnas slob ma'i mgo la rdo rje gzung ba dang /
T02TD1584E:59a-11: aom kri to wa: sarba satva aa rtha: siddhim da tv'a ya th'a aa nu g'am /
T02TD1584E:59a-12: gatstsha tham buddha bi sha yam /
T02TD1584E:59a-13: bu na r'a ga ma n'a ya tstsha h'um h'a aa dzhee: mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1584E:59a-14: 'di ni ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:59a-16: // / de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor la blta ru bcug la mig sngar ci snang dri bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59a-17: khyod kyi sems cad don kun mdzad //
T02TD1584E:59a-18: ces sogs skad dod rang sor bzhag pa /
T02TD1584E:59a-19: des brjod pa'i dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog gis zhi ba la sogs pa'i rim par go bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59a-20: de nyid kyis mthe bod lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa bzung ste /
T02TD1584E:59a-21: rdo rje'i gar dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD1584E:59a-22: bskor ba byed pa'i dus su bden pa'i byin rlabs 'di ltar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59a-24: slob ma yang dag gzhug pa yis //
T02TD1584E:59a-25: lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1584E:59a-27: rigs kyi rim pa'i snod ldan la //
T02TD1584E:59a-28: de ltar bsod nams nus pa yis //
T02TD1584E:59a-29: de bzhin dngos grub nges par ni //
T02TD1584E:59a-31: zhes pa 'di ni slob ma mig ras dang bcas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:59a-33: // / de nas sngon du gtad pa'i me tog gi phreng ba las gcig bton la /
T02TD1584E:59a-34: slob ma'i lag par tr'am zhes brjod cing gtad do//
T02TD1584E:59b-0: @59b de nas me tog gi phreng bar mos pa bya zheng bdag gis sdig pa dang bral bar dmigs la slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs te gus pa sngon du song bas sngon gyi gtso mo 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor la yid kyis dmigs la /
T02TD1584E:59b-1: de nyid kyi dbu la me tog pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aa nydza li n'a tha ho: zhes pa brjod de dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-2: re kh'a lnga'i nang du babs na 'di nyid kyis rigs brjod par bya zhing lha de dang de'i rnal 'byor sbyin par bya ba dang dngos grub kyang brtag par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-3: re kh'a lnga'i phyi ru babs na lan gsum gyi bar du slar dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-4: de ltar na yang dngos grub phra mo tsam mo //
T02TD1584E:59b-5: phyi rol gyi rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi ru babs na dngos grub med pas dkyil 'khor bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-6: dkyil 'khor du dor ba'i phreng ba de nyid la btags te phreng ba de nyid //
T02TD1584E:59b-7: aom pra ti gri hna tvam ai mam sa tva ma h'a ba la zhes pas slob ma'i mgo la gdags par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-8: 'di ni me tog gi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i chog ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:59b-10: // / de nas slob ma'i snying ga'i zla ba la gtso mo dang dpral ba la ram 'bar bzhin pa bsgoms la //
T02TD1584E:59b-11: aom b'a r'a h'i sa yante dya tsakshu: au dgha ta na tatpa ra /
T02TD1584E:59b-12: audgha ta ya ti sarba aaksho badzra tsakshu ra nutta ra /
T02TD1584E:59b-13: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i: zhes brjod de mig ras bshus la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-15: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD1584E:59b-16: khyod ni dpa' mo'i rigs su skyes //
T02TD1584E:59b-17: sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis rlob //
T02TD1584E:59b-18: he badzra pa shya zhes brjod la ming sngon du song bas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mo nas sgo ma'i bar bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:59b-19: de nas aom badzra mandala la ma h'a mandala pra wishto& ham /
T02TD1584E:59b-20: yo ga mandala ma h'a mandala darshi to& ham /
T02TD1584E:59b-21: gu hya mandala la ma h'a mandala l'a bhi shi to& ham zhes brjod de dam tshig brjod pa ni ho: ho: zhes pa ste 'di ni slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:59b-24: // / de nas ji ltar 'byor pa'i dbul ba bla ma la phul te pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD1584E:59b-25: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1584E:59b-26: mchod chen ji ltar sbyin pa ltar //
T02TD1584E:59b-27: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1584E:59b-28: rdo rje ma sogs bdag la stsol //
T02TD1584E:60a-0: zhes pa chu'i dbang bskur gyi gsol ba gdab @60a * //
T02TD1584E:60a-2: / de nas gsung bar 'gyur pa'i cho gas slob ma la ni ra manydza na byas pa dang /
T02TD1584E:60a-3: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams mchod de slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa ni //
T02TD1584E:60a-5: yon tan 'byung gnas byin pa ltar //
T02TD1584E:60a-6: de ltar slob ma 'di rnams la //
T02TD1584E:60a-7: dbang bskur dam pa sbyin par mdzod //
T02TD1584E:60a-9: de nas shar sgo ru sna tshogs padma bris pa'i steng du bsdad pa'i slob ma'i kha nas zhugs nas lha mo'i padmar skad cig gis stong pa'i ngang las h'um las mi bskyod par bskyed pa'am /
T02TD1584E:60a-10: d'a ki n'i'i gzugs su bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa la snga ma ltar spyan drangs pas dpa' bo dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i lha mo rnams chags pa chen pos zhu nas rnam par mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD1584E:60a-11: rdo rje'i lam nas byung ba'i khu ba des dbang bskur te sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i cha byad dang ldan pa padma nas phyung ba la /
T02TD1584E:60a-12: nam mkha'i gang bar gnas pa'i thabs dang bcas pa'i d'a ki n'i la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis /
T02TD1584E:60a-13: bkra shis kyi glu dang bcas pa'i slob ma rnams la dbang bskur bar bsam zhing bdag nyid kyang bkra shis brjod la /
T02TD1584E:60a-14: rnam rgyal gyi bum pa la sogs pa nas chu cung zad blangs te padma'i snod dam dung chos su blugs la bya ba'am /
T02TD1584E:60a-15: yang na bum pa so so'i rim pa bzhin du byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi'i gzugs kyi chus kha rgyan dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i rtse nas 'gro bar bya zhing /
T02TD1584E:60a-16: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1584E:60a-17: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1584E:60a-18: gsang ba gsum ni 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1584E:60a-19: byin chig dpa' mo ma lus pas //
T02TD1584E:60a-20: aom a'a: badzra audga aa bhishinytsa su ra ta stvam aa ham zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:60a-21: de nas bde ba chen po thob bar bsam pa ste 'di ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:60a-23: // / de nas gong ma ltar bla ma la gsol ba 'debs pa'i slob ma /
T02TD1584E:60b-0: aom dang rin po che las byung ba'i rin chen 'byung ldan nam gzugs can ma ru skad cig gis bskyed pa ye shes sems dpa' @60b dang ro gcig pa nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1584E:60b-1: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pas bkra shis brjod par bsam mo /
T02TD1584E:60b-3: // de nas rdo rje dang dril bu dang ming rnams la yang de ltar bya ba ste /
T02TD1584E:60b-4: de nas gser ram ras la sogs pa las byas pa rin chen 'byung ldan du gyur pas de nyid kyi rang bzhin la ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'am lha mo rnams te /
T02TD1584E:60b-5: rigs bdag dbus su gnas par byin gyis brlab par byas pa de'i mgo'i dpral ba dang /
T02TD1584E:60b-8: rgyab rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02TD1584E:60b-9: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD1584E:60b-10: aom satva badzri aa bhishinytsa bhr'um /
T02TD1584E:60b-11: aom ratna badzri aa bhishi nytsa tr'am /
T02TD1584E:60b-12: aom padma badzri aa bhishinytsa hr'i: aom karma badzri aa bhi shinytsa aa: zhes pa'i sngags lngas byin gyis brlabs la mgo bor bzung ste gong gi tshigs bcad brjod la /
T02TD1584E:60b-13: aom a'a: badzra mu ku ta aa bhishi nytsa su ra ta stvam aa ham zhes pa dang /
T02TD1584E:60b-14: badzra tu shya ho: zhes brjod de mnyes par bya ba 'di ni cod pa na gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:60b-16: // / de nas aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dar dpyangs sam me tog phreng ba dpral bar bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:60b-17: de nas de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa la hr'i: dang padma la sogs pa la 'od dpag med kyi gzugs sam khanda ro ha skad cig gis ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par bsams la gong gi tshigs bcad brjod de //
T02TD1584E:60b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang ;
T02TD1584E:60b-19: / thob pa de bzhin khyod nyid kyis //
T02TD1584E:60b-20: de ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1584E:60b-21: dngos grub dam pa 'di nyid long //
T02TD1584E:60b-22: zhes brjod de slob ma'i gnas gsum du rdo rje reg nas lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje sbyin no //
T02TD1584E:60b-23: 'di ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:60b-25: // / de nas de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i slob ma la kham dang ral gri dag las byung ba'i don yod grub pa'am l'a ma'i gzugs su ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par skad cig gis bskyed de /
T02TD1584E:60b-26: de ltar bskyed la de nyid kyi lag pa g-yon par byin te /
T02TD1584E:61a-0: rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bcas @61a * //
T02TD1584E:61a-2: gong gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa dang /
T02TD1584E:61a-3: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes pa dang /
T02TD1584E:61a-4: aom badzra gha na da aa gra hi to shri ma bha ga b'an me s'a na ni hi to bha ba zhes brjod do //
T02TD1584E:61a-5: 'di ni bdag po'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:61a-8: // / de nas de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD1584E:61a-9: aom dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad dam gtso mo'i gzugs su skad cig gis bskyed pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang tha ma dang par bya ste /
T02TD1584E:61a-10: mgo la rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la dbang bskur ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas /
T02TD1584E:61a-11: aom he ru ka aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi shi ka ta:pa ra m'a rya badzra tvam zhes pa la sogs pas me tog lhung ba'i dbye ba'i ming gis rnam par snang mdzad dam bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang bzhin la dbang bskur ba ni /
T02TD1584E:61a-12: ming gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:61a-15: // / de yang dbang 'di rnams thob pa'i slob mas bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud la nyan pa dang 'chad pa dang sngags bsgrub pa rnams la dbang ba ste /
T02TD1584E:61a-16: lhan cig skyes pa'i dbang dang bral bar rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni ma yin no //
T02TD1584E:61a-17: de nas slob ma de nyid kyis thal mo sbyar te gsol ba gdab pa ni //
T02TD1584E:61a-18: khyod nyid kyi ni bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1584E:61a-19: bdag la rang dang gzhan gyi don //
T02TD1584E:61a-20: rdzogs phyir rdo rje slob dpon dbang //
T02TD1584E:61a-21: thugs rje mchog dang ldan pas byin //
T02TD1584E:61a-23: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la //
T02TD1584E:61a-24: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1584E:61a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1584E:61a-26: mkha' 'gro ma tshogs rang bzhin te //
T02TD1584E:61a-27: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / ces brjod de de kho na'i rang bzhin rdo rje blang par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:61a-28: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:61a-30: // / de nas aa:las byung ba'i dril bu ru bsgoms te /
T02TD1584E:61a-31: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1584E:61a-32: dril bu'i sgra yi mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1584E:61a-33: khyod kyis rgyun du bzung ba yis //
T02TD1584E:61a-34: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas gsungs //
T02TD1584E:61a-36: de kho na'i rang bzhin blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:61a-37: slob mas blangs la dkrol zhing brjod pa //
T02TD1584E:61a-38: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /
T02TD1584E:61b-0: @61b ngo bo nyid kyis dngos byas pa //
T02TD1584E:61b-1: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' 'di //
T02TD1584E:61b-2: srid pa dam pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:61b-3: zhes pa 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:61b-5: // / de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1584E:61b-6: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan byas la //
T02TD1584E:61b-7: ji ltar gzugs rnams brtan pa der //
T02TD1584E:61b-8: de la phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1584E:61b-9: ye shes phyag rgyas byin rlabs la //
T02TD1584E:61b-10: 'dod pa thams cad nye bar spyad //
T02TD1584E:61b-11: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1584E:61b-13: slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i cha byad can gyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang kha sbyor du byin gyis brlabs la 'khyud pa'i dbyings su bya'o //
T02TD1584E:61b-14: 'di ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi tshig ste dam tshig gsum sbyin pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:61b-16: // / de nas dam tshig gsum blangs pa'i slob mas sngon gyi cho ga ltar shar gyi sgo'i sngon du bsdad la rdo rje sems ma'am bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku ru bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1584E:61b-17: chu'i dbang gi cho ga dang /
T02TD1584E:61b-18: dbang bskur ba'i bya ba la sogs pa'i bar byas la /
T02TD1584E:61b-19: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shr'i ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1584E:61b-20: zhes brjod cing mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:61b-21: de nas 'khor lo'i lha mo rnams de nyid las ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs kyis gzhug par byas nas /
T02TD1584E:61b-22: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la de la me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:61b-24: slob dpon dbang bskur 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1584E:61b-25: shes rab bcu drug ma nyid la //
T02TD1584E:61b-26: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor ba'i ;
T02TD1584E:61b-27: / lag pa dag gis mnyam par 'khyud //
T02TD1584E:61b-29: de yang bsdus na rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD1584E:61b-30: phung po lnga bsdus pa sangs rgyas lnga'i dag pa ste /
T02TD1584E:61b-31: phyir mi ldog pa'am slob dpon gyi dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:61b-34: // / de nas bdag nyid kyis snying po la sogs pa'i sngags lan gsum bzlas nas /
T02TD1584E:61b-35: datt'a si ma ya bha ga b'a na /
T02TD1584E:61b-38: zhes pa brjod la slob ma la sbyin no //
T02TD1584E:61b-42: dha ga b'anma yi sanni hi to bha ba /
T02TD1584E:62a-1: blang ba ni lan gsum brjod pas so //
T02TD1584E:62a-2: 'di ni sngags rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62a-4: // / de nas gser ram dngul gyi snod du mar sbrang rtsi gser gyi thur mas blangs te /
T02TD1584E:62a-5: slob ma'i mig dag tu yi ge pram bsgoms te /
T02TD1584E:62a-6: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:zhes pa brjod cing dbye ba ni /
T02TD1584E:62a-7: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD1584E:62a-8: 'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar //
T02TD1584E:62a-9: bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD1584E:62a-10: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD1584E:62a-12: 'di ni mig sman gyi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62a-14: // / de nas me long blangs te aa:zhes mngon par bzlas shing slob ma la bstan pa ni /
T02TD1584E:62a-15: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par //
T02TD1584E:62a-16: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD1584E:62a-17: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1584E:62a-18: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD1584E:62a-19: rdo rje ma ni me long mtshungs //
T02TD1584E:62a-20: dpa' mo kun gyi gtso mo ste //
T02TD1584E:62a-21: bu khyod snying la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1584E:62a-22: khyod ni 'dren pa'i spyan dang ldan //
T02TD1584E:62a-23: ngo bo med cing gnas med pa //
T02TD1584E:62a-24: 'di ltar chos rnams shes gyis [*kyis] la //
T02TD1584E:62a-25: sems can don ni mnyam med gyis [*kyis] //
T02TD1584E:62a-26: zhes pa ni me long gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62a-28: // / de nas ho:yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho zhes pas byin la yang /
T02TD1584E:62a-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ru r'a ga ya ya sva zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:62a-30: slob mas kyang mda' bkang bzhin pas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta na aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes brjod cing blos bgegs la dbug par bsam zhing phyogs mtshams steng 'og rnams su'o //
T02TD1584E:62a-31: 'di ni mda' gzhu'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62a-33: // / de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs su bsgoms nas /
T02TD1584E:62a-34: 'di ni dpa' mo thams cad dang //
T02TD1584E:62a-35: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD1584E:62a-36: khyod kyis rgyun tu gzung bar bya //
T02TD1584E:62a-37: rdo rje ma yi brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1584E:62a-38: zhes brjod de rdo rje gtad do //
T02TD1584E:62a-39: aom sarba b'i ra tvam siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dh'a ra y'a mi badzra satva h'i:hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod de blang par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:62a-40: 'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62b-0: // / de nas slob ma rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs su @62b bsgoms te /
T02TD1584E:62b-1: kha tv'am gri gug padma'i snod //
T02TD1584E:62b-2: rdo rje phag mo'i phyag mtshan 'di //
T02TD1584E:62b-3: phyi dang nang na yang dag gnas //
T02TD1584E:62b-4: byin pa zung cig dpa' mo yis //
T02TD1584E:62b-6: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la byin par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:62b-7: 'di ni kha tv'am ga la sogs pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62b-9: // / de nas slob ma de ltar bsgoms la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'khor lo la sogs pa la gzhug pa ni //
T02TD1584E:62b-10: mi bskyod pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs //
T02TD1584E:62b-11: 'od dpag med pa rna rgyan te //
T02TD1584E:62b-12: rin chen nyid ni mgul rgyan no //
T02TD1584E:62b-13: rnam par snang mdzad lag gdub gsungs //
T02TD1584E:62b-14: don grub ska rags nyid la bstan //
T02TD1584E:62b-15: zhes gsungs pas rim pa bzhin du /
T02TD1584E:62b-16: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat ces pa bzlas te 'khor lo mgo bor ro //
T02TD1584E:62b-17: de ltar thod pa lnga la yang ngo //
T02TD1584E:62b-18: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat ces pa rna rgyan dag la'o //
T02TD1584E:62b-19: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye hum h'um phat ces pa mgul rgyan la'o //
T02TD1584E:62b-25: phat ham zhas pa lag gdub dag la'o //
T02TD1584E:62b-30: phat phat ces pa lan gsum bzlas la ska rags te de ltar gsum gsum kun la go bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:62b-31: 'di ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62b-33: // / de nas lung bstan ni phyag rgya dang bcas pas brjod la //
T02TD1584E:62b-34: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas //
T02TD1584E:62b-35: srid pa mchog tu zhi ba'i phyir //
T02TD1584E:62b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1584E:62b-37: bdag gis khyod ni lung bstan bgyi //
T02TD1584E:62b-39: me tog lhung ba'i sgo nas rang gi rigs kyi ming dang bcas te brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:62b-40: sarba ta th'a ga ta si ddhya sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:zhes pas so //
T02TD1584E:62b-41: 'di ni lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:62b-43: // / de nas yol ba la sogs pas dben par byas pa'i gnas su gzhon nu ma gzugs dang lang tsho la sogs pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya slob mas bla ma la phul te /
T02TD1584E:63a-0: thal mo sbyar nas bla ma bcom ldan 'das mar @63a * //
T02TD1584E:63a-2: khyod nyid kyi ni bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1584E:63a-3: bla na med pa'i bya ba thob //
T02TD1584E:63a-4: de phyir gsang ba yin dbang //
T02TD1584E:63a-5: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD1584E:63a-6: ces pas gsol ba gtab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:63a-7: de nas slob dpon gyis lha mo'i nga rgyal spangs te bde mchog gi cha byad dam /
T02TD1584E:63a-8: thabs kyi cha byad du gnas /
T02TD1584E:63a-9: phyag rgya tha mal gyi bdag nyid stong pa'i dang las lha mor bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63a-10: rdo rje padma byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du song ba snyoms par zhugs pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63a-11: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63a-12: snying ga'i sa bon gyis spyan drangs pa'i lha mo so so rnams dang snyoms par zhugs pa dang de rnams bdag nyid la bstim mo //
T02TD1584E:63a-13: chags pa chen pos zhu nas aa ba dh'u t'i nas 'thon te rdo rje'i nor bur lhan cig skyes pa brtan par byas la /
T02TD1584E:63a-14: mthe bo dang ming med kyis rdo rje'i nor bu bzung la padma nas byung ste /
T02TD1584E:63a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa zhu ba dang bdag nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems tha mi dad par dmigs nas slob ma gsung rdo rje'i gzugs su bskyed la mthong na ma gus pa skye bas mig ras kyis bcings la lag pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63a-16: mig gi spyod yul ma yin par kha ru dbab pa ni ;
T02TD1584E:63a-17: sangs rgyas rnams ni sras rnams la //
T02TD1584E:63a-18: rdo rje 'dzin sogs byang chub sems //
T02TD1584E:63a-19: yid du 'ong bas dbang bskur ltar //
T02TD1584E:63a-20: de ltar bskur cig bu rnams la //
T02TD1584E:63a-21: zhes pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mo'i sngags dang bcas pas brjod cing ngo //
T02TD1584E:63a-22: des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bla ma'i tshogs kyis kye ma bde'o zhes brjod cing btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:63a-23: phyag rgya ma langs te gos dang bral bar byas la rang gi padma na gnas pa'i thig le de'i khar dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:63a-24: des kyang de ltar btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:63a-25: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi kun rdzob byang chub sems gsang bas na gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1584E:63a-26: 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:63a-28: // / de nas slob mas brjod pa//
T02TD1584E:63a-29: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1584E:63a-30: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63b-0: bsnyen par sangs @63b rgyas nyid kyis brtags //
T02TD1584E:63b-1: 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1584E:63b-2: bde ba dam ba nyams su myong //
T02TD1584E:63b-3: rdo rje skyil krung mtshan pa yis //
T02TD1584E:63b-4: nor bu'i mtha' ru blta bar bya //
T02TD1584E:63b-6: de nyid dam phyag rgya gzhan cig gtad par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:63b-7: de yang gur kum la sogs pa dri zhim pos lus la byugs te /
T02TD1584E:63b-8: slob ma la chu skyes bstan cing /
T02TD1584E:63b-10: bdag ge padma ngo mtshar che //
T02TD1584E:63b-11: bde ba kun gyi gzhi dang ldan //
T02TD1584E:63b-12: cho ga ji bzhin bsten byas nas //
T02TD1584E:63b-13: de yi mdun du bdag gnas so //
T02TD1584E:63b-14: padma'i bya ba byed bzhin bas //
T02TD1584E:63b-15: yang dag sangs rgyas mnyes byed na ;
T02TD1584E:63b-16: / bde chen po ni 'di nyid la //
T02TD1584E:63b-17: bdag nyid rgyun du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1584E:63b-18: bha nydza moksha ho:zhes brjod pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63b-19: de nas rang nyid lha'i cha byad byas te /
T02TD1584E:63b-20: shes rab lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed //
T02TD1584E:63b-21: de nas h'um dkar po dang a'a:dmar pos rdo rje dang padmar bskyed /
T02TD1584E:63b-22: by'a dang dy'a yis bum pa dang ze'u 'brur byas pa la de dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63b-23: g-yon gyis g-yon na gnas pa'i rtsa mdzub mo'i rtsa la hr'i:dmar po gcig bsam pa dang /
T02TD1584E:63b-24: lce yis s'i zhes brjod cing bskyed do //
T02TD1584E:63b-25: aom s'i s'i s'i ha ha ha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1584E:63b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa yang brjod cing bla ma'i gdams ngag las dga' ba'i dbye ba rnams shes par byas la /
T02TD1584E:63b-28: bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi lus byin gyis brlabs te bla mas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa bcug pas ro gcig tu gyur par bsam zhing snyoms par 'jug tu gzhug go //
T02TD1584E:63b-29: 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1584E:63b-30: bde ba dam pa nyams su myong //
T02TD1584E:63b-31: rdo rje skyil krung mtshan pa yis //
T02TD1584E:63b-32: nor bu'i mtha' ru blta bar bya //
T02TD1584E:63b-33: zhes pa'i don go bar bya ste ji ltar rigs pa ltar bzung la dal gyis dal gyis btang zhing padma nas lces blang bar bya ste /
T02TD1584E:63b-34: de kho na'i rang bzhin du btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1584E:63b-35: 'di ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:63b-37: // / de nas dbang gsum pa blangs pa de la bzhi pa tshig dbang sbyin pa ni /
T02TD1584E:64a-0: @64a * // shes rab ye shes des gnas skabs kyi bye brag thob pa bsgoms pas byang chub kyi sems 'phel zhing nyon mongs pa dag nas chos thams cad bsam du med pa dag dang rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang bzhin 'di rnams kyi don brjod pa 'di ni dbang bzhi pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:64a-2: // / de nas phyag rgya'i lag pa slob ma'i lag tu gtad pa dang /
T02TD1584E:64a-3: de dag slob dpon gyi lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
T02TD1584E:64a-4: g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:64a-5: khyod la ngas 'di gtad pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin no //
T02TD1584E:64a-7: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dpang po byas te /
T02TD1584E:64a-8: de ltar rnam par sbyor ba 'dis //
T02TD1584E:64a-9: khams gsum rnam par dag byed pas //
T02TD1584E:64a-10: gang gis byed par mi 'gyur na //
T02TD1584E:64a-11: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min //
T02TD1584E:64a-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1584E:64a-13: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD1584E:64a-14: rmongs pa gang zhig 'das pa na //
T02TD1584E:64a-15: de la dngos grub ga la yod //
T02TD1584E:64a-16: ces brjod la rig ma'i brtul zhugs sbyin no //
T02TD1584E:64a-17: 'di ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:64a-20: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1584E:64a-22: byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur gyis //
T02TD1584E:64a-23: slob ma'i dri ma rnam par dag / de nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin //
T02TD1584E:64a-24: zhes pa'i tshig gis slob ma gang zhig stan la bsdad pa las /
T02TD1584E:64a-26: aom badzra he tu mam zhes brjod de rkang pa dag la sbyin no //
T02TD1584E:64a-27: aa:las byung ba'i dung dang dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i po ti dang /
T02TD1584E:64a-28: dbyangs yig tha ma las byung ba'i dril bu rnams lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ru gtad la //
T02TD1584E:64a-29: slob ma de nyid dril bu 'khrol du gzhug cing brjod pa //
T02TD1584E:64a-30: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1584E:64a-31: nam mkha' nyid la mtshan nyid bral //
T02TD1584E:64a-32: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yis //
T02TD1584E:64a-33: kun gyi mchog ste de nyid gsal //
T02TD1584E:64a-34: deng nas brtsams pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD1584E:64a-35: chos kyi drung ni bla med pa //
T02TD1584E:64a-36: kun tu gang bar byed bzhin pas //
T02TD1584E:64b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu @64b bskor ;
T02TD1584E:64b-2: de ltar thun mong gi rjes su gnang ba byin la /
T02TD1584E:64b-3: khyad par gyi rjes su gnang ba ni /
T02TD1584E:64b-4: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob ma rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'am /
T02TD1584E:64b-5: bcom ldan 'das ma la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD1584E:64b-6: sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir //
T02TD1584E:64b-7: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la //
T02TD1584E:64b-8: ji ltar 'dul ba'i chos rnams kyi //
T02TD1584E:64b-9: 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyis //
T02TD1584E:64b-10: thabs dang shes rab dang bzhin bdag / yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs par //
T02TD1584E:64b-11: dal med dmigs pa rnams dang bral //
T02TD1584E:64b-12: sems can don rnams de ring gyis //
T02TD1584E:64b-14: chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang las rnams kyi sgra lan lnga brjod cing rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1584E:64b-15: des kyang phyag 'tshal te brjod pa'o //
T02TD1584E:64b-16: mnga' bdag bka' stsal de ltar bgyi //
T02TD1584E:64b-17: zhes pa 'di ni rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:64b-19: // / de nas shar sgor slob ma'i steng du gdugs bzung la thal mo sbyar te brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:64b-20: slob ma 'di ni khyod la gtad //
T02TD1584E:64b-21: rgyud kyi 'dzin pa po ru mdzod //
T02TD1584E:64b-22: ces dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02TD1584E:64b-23: gdugs gzhan du bzhag ste brjod pa /
T02TD1584E:64b-25: sngags dang rgyud kyi 'dzin pa khyod //
T02TD1584E:64b-26: sangs rgyas rnams dang byang sems dang //
T02TD1584E:64b-27: lha rnams kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:64b-28: sems can kun la brtse ba yis //
T02TD1584E:64b-29: mchog bzhin dkyil 'khor khyod nyid kyis //
T02TD1584E:64b-30: shin tu rtsol bas bri bar mdzod //
T02TD1584E:64b-31: sgrub pa po yi rgyud la zhugs //
T02TD1584E:64b-32: gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1584E:64b-33: mchog tu blta zhing zhugs pa yis //
T02TD1584E:64b-34: de ring khyod kyi sdig pa rnams //
T02TD1584E:64b-35: ma lus grol nas yang dag gnas //
T02TD1584E:64b-36: gzhan yang khyod la 'pho ba med //
T02TD1584E:64b-37: bde chen theg pa 'di nyid kyis //
T02TD1584E:64b-38: 'khor ba shin tu dag byas nas //
T02TD1584E:64b-39: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las log / tshe ldan de ring dbang nyid kyis //
T02TD1584E:64b-40: sangs rgyas kun kyang rdo rjer bcas //
T02TD1584E:64b-41: khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid kyi //
T02TD1584E:64b-42: rje bor khyod nyid nges pa'o //
T02TD1584E:64b-43: 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu //
T02TD1584E:65a-0: khams gsum na ni yod pa @65a * //
T02TD1584E:65a-2: / de phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba //
T02TD1584E:65a-3: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig / chags pa kun la nye bar spyod //
T02TD1584E:65a-4: bde chen nam yang 'jigs ma byed //
T02TD1584E:65a-5: sha lnga bdud rtsi dang bcas spyod //
T02TD1584E:65a-6: dam tshig gzhan yang de bzhin bsrung //
T02TD1584E:65a-7: srog gcod pa ni nam yang min ;
T02TD1584E:65a-8: / dpal gyi rin chen spang mi bya //
T02TD1584E:65a-9: sdom pa spang bar mi bya zhing //
T02TD1584E:65a-10: khyod kyis slob dpon mi spong ngo //
T02TD1584E:65a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ltar //
T02TD1584E:65a-12: mi bya ba ni ci yang med //
T02TD1584E:65a-13: shes rab thabs kyi sems bstan pas //
T02TD1584E:65a-14: khyod la sdig med 'jigs mi dgos //
T02TD1584E:65a-15: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1584E:65a-16: yid du'ong ba'i bu la bya ba ltar //
T02TD1584E:65a-17: brtse ba'i yid kyis dpa' bo rnams dang ni //
T02TD1584E:65a-18: dpa' mo kun la gus pas mnyam par zhog / nyid kyi nyid kyis gus pas rgyun mi 'chad pa dang //
T02TD1584E:65a-19: dam tshig dag gis mi zad bde ba ster ba ni //
T02TD1584E:65a-20: bde mchog la gnas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams dang //
T02TD1584E:65a-21: mnyam pa'i mi 'gyur pa ru khyod rnams 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1584E:65a-22: zhes pa ni dbugs dbyung ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o /
T02TD1584E:65a-24: // / de nas slob ma de ltar dbang bskur ba thob pa dang /
T02TD1584E:65a-25: de ring bdag cag 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1584E:65a-26: de ring bdag ni srog dang ldan //
T02TD1584E:65a-27: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD1584E:65a-28: de ring sangs rgyas gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD1584E:65a-29: zhes brjod nas rta dang glang po rin po che dang gser dang dngul dang gos dang rgyan dang ba lang dang g-yog po dang g-yog mo dang chung ma dang bu la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor pa bla ma la dbul bar bya'o //
